news_header: A phone app may help users achieve lucid dreams by using sound cues and cognitive training.
news_text: A new phone app has been developed to enhance users' chances of experiencing lucid dreams. By having users listen to specific sounds before bed and associating them with self-awareness, the app aims to reactivate this awareness during sleep. Initial experiments showed a significant increase in reported lucid dreams among users. Further testing confirmed that sound cues are effective in promoting lucid dreaming. Researchers emphasize the potential of this DIY method for recreational and research purposes.
